headline: Regeneron Prevails over Amgen in Antitrust PCSK9 Lawsuit Protecting Biotech Innovation and Patient Access to Life-Saving Treatments
summary: Federal court jury found Amgen liable for violating antitrust and tort laws by using cross-therapeutic bundled rebates to prevent Praluent® (alirocumab) from competing in the market Jury awarded Regeneron $135.6 million dollars of compensatory damages and $271.2 million dollars in punitive damages TARRYTOWN, N.Y., May 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ: REGN) applauds the jury verdict in the U.S. District Court for the District of Delaware that found that Amgen
